title: Kristen Faulkner Won America’s First Road Gold in 40 Years, and She Wasn’t Even Supposed To Race
content:
Triathlete Taylor Knibb gave up her spot on the two-rider Olympic squad to gold medalist Faulkner: 'It was as easy decision to make.'

Read the full article at Kristen Faulkner Won America’s First Road Gold in 40 Years, and She Wasn’t Even Supposed To Race on Velo.
author: ahood
